title: List all migration subtasks for a workflow
description: Lists all migration subtasks for a specified migration workflow. Use this to monitor the status of individual steps within a larger BigQuery migration.

objective.narrative: To effectively manage and debug a BigQuery migration, an administrator or developer needs visibility into the individual steps of the process. This sample provides the code to retrieve all subtasks associated with a migration workflow, enabling them to programmatically check the status of each step and automate monitoring or alerting.

regionTags.name: bigquerymigration_v2_migrationservice_migrationsubtasks_list
regionTags.title: List all migration subtasks for a workflow
